nodes.text: Garden of Izax was a garden located in the Spire of the Eternal Empire capital of Zakuul that was named after the deity Izax. Following the death of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY, the Eternal Fleet went rogue and blockaded the Spire. The Commander of the Alliance arrived to Zakuul on the Gravestone and passed through the garden on the way to the Eternal Throne.
Garden of Izax appears as an area on Zakuul during the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne Chapter IX: The Eternal Throne.
